resources.string: Nozomi
"I will write my own luck and have all the happiness in it."
"I AM doing my best."
"Happiness is a choice. There is always a reason to smile."
"It's okay to make mistakes. Mistakes are how I grow."
"I believe in myself."
"Bad emotions will pass. I am going to get through this."
"It's okay to not know everything."
"I AM enough."
"I will focus on what I can control."
"I am healing and strengthening every day."
"You really have bad luck."
"You will fail."
"There's nothing you can be happy about."
"You keep making mistakes."
"Your head\'s too high up in the clouds."
"You'll just stay feeling bad."
"There's still a lot of things you don't know."
"You're still not enough."
"It is inevitable."
"Your past scars still affect you."
I am in the right place at the right time, doing the right thing. \n - LOUIS HAY
You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. \n - RAM DASS
The chance to love and be loved exists no matter where you are. \n - OPRAH
Who you are inside is what helps you make and do everything in life. \n - FRED ROGERS
Your perspective is unique. Itâ€™s important and it counts. \n - GLENN CLOSE
Nothing can dim the light that shines from within. \n - MAYA ANGELOU
The secret of attraction is to love yourself. \n - DEEPAK CHOPRA
I say looking on the bright side of life never killed anybody. \n - JENNY HAN
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope. \n - MARTIN LUTHER KING JR.
